https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1ddBTDKTgVlQex3MDc7Bz092xL7.jpg Combining both worlds of traditional live-action and CG, this short film follows the vivid imagination of a lonely girl as she searches for a friend. A Work in Progress received a Student Academy Award in the Animation Category. A Work in Progress
